name: 施欣文
objective: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
schedule:
Each week, the students will have a short reading which will help provide us with our conversation topics. The students will have a quiz on this reading and also on word stems (which will help students improve their vocabulary). 

Students are all expected to engage in discussion with one another. They may also make presentations or lead class discussion.
scorePolicy:
30%　　Presentations (graded on criteria such as clarity, fluency, originality, creativity, and effort)
30%　　Reading and Vocabulary Quizzes
25%　　Participation & English spoken (in student-led discussions, whole-class activities, etc.) 
15%　　Final Oral Exam/Improvisation
